levels.description:
The next attack deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage. When Pepe is affected by a <$ba.debuff>Negative Status</>, this skill can be used to remove the <$ba.debuff>Negative Status</>
<@ba.rem>Can store 1 charge</>
